name: Human BMI Calculator
author: Tareq Mahmud

sections.description:
Human BMI (Body Mass Index) Calculator plugin will help you display the calculator in your website.

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/human-bmi-calculator/

  • Live Demo
  • Need Help?
  • About Author

Video Tutorial

Coming Soon!

Settings

  • No extra settings is required.

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!

Usage

  • After activation, go to BMI Calculator Page in Dashboard and copy the shortcode and paste it to your desired page or post where you want to display the calculator.

Features

  • Easy installation
  • Very Easy to use. Just copy the shortcode and paste it into the desired section.
sections.installation:
1. Upload human-bmi-calculator to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do I need to setup anything?

No.

short_description: Human BMI (Body Mass Index) Calculator will help you to check your current BMI for your height and weight.
